definitions.description: a living organism of the kind exemplified by trees, shrubs, herbs, grasses, ferns, and mosses, typically growing in a permanent site, absorbing water and inorganic substances through its roots, and synthesizing nutrients in its leaves by photosynthesis using the green pigment chlorophyll.
a place where an industrial or manufacturing process takes place
a person placed in a group as a spy or informer
a shot in which the cue ball is made to strike one of two touching or nearly touching balls with the result that the second is potted.
